description: Global components (Navigation, Footer, Logo) and all layouts. Also sets up content collection schemas. Depends on PRD-01 completion.

userStories.title: Migrate to NextNode brand fonts
userStories.description: As a developer, I want to use NextNode brand fonts instead of buio fonts so that the site matches our brand guidelines.
acceptanceCriteria: Plus Jakarta Sans variable font (woff2) is in public/fonts/plus-jakarta-sans/
DM Sans variable font (woff2) is in public/fonts/dm-sans/
JetBrains Mono variable font (woff2) is in public/fonts/jetbrains-mono/
Old font files removed (geist/, geist-mono/, eb-garamond/)
userStories.notes: Download from fontsource. Update Fonts.astro and global.css @theme block. Remove old buio fonts.

userStories.title: Import Logo.astro with NextNode branding
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the Logo component updated with NextNode branding so that the site displays our logo.
acceptanceCriteria: Supports both light and dark variants
userStories.notes: Use existing NextNode logo assets or create placeholder SVG with NextNode text

userStories.title: Import Navigation.astro without search
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the Navigation component so that the site has a header with dropdown menus.
acceptanceCriteria: Search button is removed from navigation
Links are configurable via props or config

userStories.title: Import MobileNav.astro component
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the MobileNav component so that mobile users have navigation.
acceptanceCriteria: CSS grid animation works for open/close
Uses Menu and Close icons from fundations

userStories.title: Import Footer.astro with newsletter
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the Footer component with newsletter signup so that the site has a proper footer.
acceptanceCriteria: Footer links are organized in columns

userStories.title: Import BaseLayout.astro
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the BaseLayout so that pages have consistent structure with nav and footer.
acceptanceCriteria: Logger is integrated for page load tracking
Props are properly typed (title, description, etc.)

userStories.title: Import ChangelogLayout.astro
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the ChangelogLayout so that changelog pages have proper structure.
acceptanceCriteria: Has sidebar or navigation for changelog entries

userStories.title: Import CustomersLayout.astro
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the CustomersLayout so that customer case study pages have proper structure.
acceptanceCriteria: Supports customer logo, quote, case study content

userStories.title: Import HelpCenterLayout.astro
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the HelpCenterLayout so that help articles have proper structure.

userStories.title: Import JobsLayout.astro
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the JobsLayout so that job posting pages have proper structure.
acceptanceCriteria: Supports job details: title, department, location, type

userStories.title: Import LegalLayout.astro
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the LegalLayout so that legal pages (privacy, terms) have proper structure.
acceptanceCriteria: Has clean typography for legal content

userStories.title: Import SplashLayout.astro
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the SplashLayout so that pages without nav/footer can exist (e.g., coming soon).
acceptanceCriteria: Includes BaseHead for proper head setup

userStories.title: Import TeamLayout.astro
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the TeamLayout so that team member pages have proper structure.
acceptanceCriteria: Supports member photo, name, role, bio

userStories.title: Setup content collection schemas
userStories.description: As a developer, I want content collection schemas defined so that MDX content is properly typed.
acceptanceCriteria: src/content/config.ts exists with all collection schemas
helpcenter collection: title, description, category, pubDate
team collection: name, role, bio, image, social links
jobs collection: title, department, location, type, description
customers collection: name, logo, industry, quote, caseStudy
changelog collection: version, date, type, description
All schemas use zod for validation
userStories.notes: Create or update src/content/config.ts with Astro content collections API

userStories.title: Create PR to main for structure phase
userStories.description: As a developer, I want a PR created so that the structure work can be reviewed and merged.
acceptanceCriteria: All previous stories in this PRD pass
PR is created with gh pr create
PR title follows convention: feat(buio): global components and layouts
PR description lists all components and layouts added
userStories.notes: Use gh pr create --title 'feat(buio): global components and layouts' --body '...'
